1: -module(cache_app_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("/usr/local/Cellar/erlang//26.0.2/lib/erlang/lib/common_test-1.25/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("/usr/local/Cellar/erlang//26.0.2/lib/erlang/lib/stdlib-5.0.2/include/assert.hrl").
    5: 
    6: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
    7: -export([test_create_table/1, test_insert_lookup/1, test_ttl/1]).
    8: 
    9: suite() ->
   10:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 5}}].
   11: 
   12: all() ->
   13:     [test_create_table, test_insert_lookup, test_ttl].
   14: 
   15: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   16:     application:start(cache_app),
   17:     [].
   18: 
   19: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   20:     application:stop(cache_app),
   21:     ok.
   22: 
   23: test_create_table(_Config) ->
   24:     {ok, _} = cache_app:create("test_table"),
   25:     %% Assert table exists
   26:     true = ets:info("test_table") =/= undefined.
   27: 
   28: test_insert_lookup(_Config) ->
   29:     cache_app:create("test_table"),
   30:     cache_app:insert("test_table", "key1", "value1"),
   31:     "value1" = cache_app:lookup("test_table", "key1").
   32: 
   33: test_ttl(_Config) ->
   34:     cache_app:create("test_table"),
   35:     cache_app:insert("test_table", "key2", "value2", 1),
   36:     timer:sleep(1500),
   37:     undefined = cache_app:lookup("test_table", "key2").
